overview: Brittany Stryker and Buck Adams have just moved into their dream home, a gorgeous house with lots of space, a great view and terrific, sexy neighbors. The house also really has that lived-in feeling, which isn't surprising since it also has one little feature that the real estate agent didn't tell Buck and Brittany about. Put simply, their new dream home is swarming with restless and super horny ghosts. What to do?
title: Restless Passion
